summary: Dream a Little Dream of Me
body:
Dream a Little Dream of Me

Here, take this offering of this tiny little Jonerys gothic romance dream fic I’ve begun as you wait for the next chapter of Of Gods and Dragons.

Summary: While stepping into the role of Lord Commander, Jon begins to have strange dreams of a cloaked woman. No matter how hard he tries to ignore them, the dreams won’t stop and begin to haunt his waking thoughts. And with the threat of Winter and White Walkers, he really doesn’t need any type of distraction.

But when did things ever go the way he’d like?

Chapter 1:

After everything that had happened that day, Jon wanted nothing more than to crawl into bed.

He couldn’t believe that Stannis had offered him legitimacy and the lordship of Winterfell. Part of him had desperately wanted to accept, the part that had yearned to be a true Stark since he was old enough to understand what being a Snow meant. But a much larger part of him knew that it wasn’t right. He wasn’t a Stark and Stannis could call himself a king all he wanted, but he wasn’t on the Iron throne. He had no authority to give a bastard such a title. Besides, none of the Northern lords would have followed Stannis even if Jon had accepted the offer. He knew the stern man was not going to like hearing the refusal, but Jon couldn’t do anything about that.

Keep reading

summary: Daenerys Targaryen & Jon Snow, favorite conversations (part 1)
caption: Daenerys Targaryen & Jon Snow, favorite conversations (part 1)

summary: “Jon is going to want to repudiate his Targaryen side.”
body:
“Jon is going to want to repudiate his Targaryen side.”

Fucking why? Because you want it? His “father” raised him on the history of House Targaryen. Jon ran around pretending to be the “heroes” of House Targaryen. From Aemon the Dragonknight to Daeron, Jon as a child looked up to the Targs of old. His “father” who lost three of his family to Targs, two by murder, does nothing to stop this. He doesn’t present Jon with an anti-Targ agenda. He doesn’t talk about the Rebellion at all. That’s critical: no one would blame Ned for hating Targs like Robert does. BUT HE DOESNT.

We are in Ned’s head. He NEVER thinks negatively of Rhaegar at all. He barely thinks about him, true, but when he does, he thinks him a better man than Robert (hmmmm wonder why Lyanna went to him) who is like a brother to him. He hates the Mad King, and who wouldn’t in his situation, but he doesn’t hate the Mad King’s family. And that’s BEFORE he finds out about Jon. The deaths of Aegon and Rhaenys deeply affect him.

Aerys aside (and it’s a big thing to put aside) Jon has no reason to turn away from his Targ side, especially when he finds out that his parents loved each other. That doesn’t mean he won’t be pissed at Rhaegar for his actions, but to repudiate his entire Targ side? No. Will he take a while to warm up to it, to accept the reality that he IS not only a Targ, but Aegon Targaryen? Oh for sure. But again, nothing he’s learned in his life growing up has given him reason to hate House Targ as a whole.

And when he has a support system in Winterfell like he will (Arya, Sansa as his supportive sisters) (Daenerys as his Targ support) it makes even less sense that he would turn from his Targaryen side.

summary:
I think Sansa twists (Jon) in a way that no one else can…

I think she’s infuriating to him and she knows that. But she knows...
caption:
I think Sansa twists (Jon) in a way that no one else can… I think she’s infuriating to him and she knows that. But she knows she’s cleverer than Jon, in many ways. -Kit Harington (x)

Don’t forget that she also could “straighten” him up:

reblog.comment:

summary: The Ginger Wolf and the Copper Dragon - LAStoryWriterAlex - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: The Ginger Wolf and the Copper Dragon - LAStoryWriterAlex - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/5
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
Rating: Mature
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: Jon Snow/Daenerys Targaryen
Characters: Daenerys Targaryen, Rhaego (ASoIaF), Missandei (ASoIaF), Tormund Giantsbane, Davos Seaworth, Sansa Stark, Arya Stark, Gendry Waters, Ygritte and Jon Snow’s daughter, Jon Snow, Jorah Mormont, Barristan Selmy, Tyrion Lannister, Ghost (ASoIaF)
Additional Tags: Jon and Ygritte had a daughter, Rhaego lived, The timeline is completely fucked for my purposes but whatever I don’t care, Try not to get hung up on the logistics, this is just for fun, R plus L equals J, single parents Jon and Dany, extra fluffy, Tooth Rotting Fluff, with a pinch of boatsex to spice things up
Summary:

Shortly after his election as the 998th Lord Commander of the Night’s Watch, Jon Snow is visited by a wildling woman with news that will change his world forever.

Additional Tags: Jon and Ygritte had a daughter, Rhaego lived, The timeline is completely fucked for my purposes but whatever I don’t care, Try not to get hung up on the logistics, this is just for fun, R plus L equals J, single parents Jon and Dany, extra fluffy, Tooth Rotting Fluff, with a pinch of boatsex to spice things up
Summary:

Shortly after his election as the 998th Lord Commander of the Night’s Watch, Jon Snow is visited by a wildling woman with news that will change his world forever.
